short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classic Snake Game: Simple, addictive, and fun! The snake speeds up as it grows longer. Highest score saved.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classic Snake Game: Control a growing snake to eat food, avoid walls and itself. Simple, addictive, and fun! Use arrow keys to change direction. The snake speeds up as it grows longer. Highest score saved. Enjoy this timeless game!
